facts.fact: Javlyn can choose to block the cave entrance with a rockslide.

evidence.quote: She kicked at what looked like the look rocks from the bottom, huge as they were her kicks did near nothing. She tried to push, and then scrambled near their base with her fingers trying to do something to help it move. There was a moment of disbelief when the boulder started to actually shift forward before the sword broke two thirds of the way down the blade and the boulder started to rock back. With a grunt of effort, the boulder broke free of the cliff and tumbled down, knocking several other rocks along the way. Javlyn stumbled and barely saved herself from following the boulder. Once she was sure she wouldn't tumble, she peered over the ledge and grinned to see she had caused enough of a rockslide to cover the cave entrance.

evidence.quote: Grouped together at the back of the cave were three, no four creatures. They were focused on something on the ground and almost before she could fully process what she'd seen Javlyn pulled back around the corner. Lips pressed tight together, she tried not to breathe too heavily, terrified the creatures would hear her.
There was no way she could fight four creatures.
